short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and learn about chart patterns in the stock market

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you an active trader in the Indian stock market and have you wondered if it were possible to have a tool that helps you find chart patterns, ICT, Wyckoff, Harmonic, Wave and Fibonacci patterns easily?
Look no further, Orion is the tool you've been looking for!

Chart patterns are the distinctive patterns created by the movements of stock prices on a chart and are the foundation of technical analysis. Every trader would have come across them at some point in their trading period. Technical analysts seek to identify patterns to anticipate the future direction of a stock's price

DISCLAIMER 
This software does not come with any form of warranty and by using it, you are agreeing to use at your own risk and you are solely responsible for the outcome. By using this plugin neither OrionCharts or anyone else is liable of anything, due to any reason, whatsoever. This tool is purely for educational purposes.

Orion tracks popular chart, ICT, Wyckoff, Harmonic, Wave and Fibonacci patterns and points out when and where a pattern has been formed. Draw lines on the chart based on the info provided by the plugin and you can see these patterns for yourself. On tradingview charts, the plugin will automatically plot the selected pattern on your chart
Kindly note that Orion is in beta stage and we're working to improve our services

Chart Patterns available in Orion:
 - Cup&Handle
 - RoundingBottom
 - InvertedCup&Handle
 - RoundingTop
 - Head&Shoulder
 - InvertedHead&Shoulder
 - DoubleTop
 - DoubleBottom
 - TripleTop
 - TripleBottom
 - AscendingTriangle
 - DescendingTriangle
 - SymmetricalTriangle
 - SupportBreach
 - ResistanceBreach
 - HigherLow
 - HigherHigh
 - HigherHigh&HigherLow
 - LowerHigh
 - LowerLow
 - LowerLow&LowerHigh

ICT Patterns available in Orion:
 - OrderBlocks
 - FairValueGaps
 - SwingHigh/Low
 - MarketStructureShift
 - Displacement
 - BalancedPriceRange

Wyckoff Patterns available in Orion:
 - WyckoffAccumulation
 - WyckoffDistribution

Harmonic Patterns available in Orion:
 - AB=CD
 - Gartley
 - Bat
 - Butterfly
 - Crab
 - Shark
 - Cypher

Wave Patterns available in Orion:
 - ElliottImpulse
 - ElliottImpulse&Correction
 - NeoWave
 - Merrill (M & W)
 - Wolfe

Fibonacci Patterns available in Orion:
 - Fibonacci Retracements (0.618, 0.5, 0.382, 0.236)

Currently Orion works only for the following Indian brokerages
 - Upstox
 - Groww
 - Zerodha
 - AngelOne
 - TradingView

Others brokerages will be added in the future

Orion works for the following segments as of now
 - NSE Equities
 - NSE Indices

Other segments will be added in the future

Feedback helps us improve our services and we encourage you to write your queries to orioncharts.dev@gmail.com
